lore: Larger and more deadly than Seeker Chariots, these infernal engines offer the legions of Slaanesh comparatively heavyweight weapons to break their victimsâ€™ lines. Multi-hued wheels emitting blurred skeins of hypnotic light, axles screaming like damned souls, they tear through the enemy ranks again and again.

otherAbilities.Infernal Engines of Torment:: In the Fight phase , after this model has finished making its attacks, if one or more enemy units were destroyed as a result of those attacks, every enemy unit within 6" of this model must take a Battle-shock test .
